colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027A *, ,(CES BSNYEN YIG DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI NYE 'KHOR BA DKA' BCU SHES DAR BA SOGS DU MA DANG, NANG RIG PA DANG GSO BA RIG PA LA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN MDO SNGAGS RAB 'BYAMS LA SBYANGS PA MI DMAN ZHING RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BSTAN 'DZIN GRAGS PA, SKYE BAS THOB PA'I BLO GROS KYI RTZAL GSUNG RAB LA LTA BA'I MIG DANG LDAN ZHING DON GNYER DANG BCAS PA'I DGE SLONG CHOS RGYA MTSO DANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG LA SOGS PA'I DON GNYER CAN MANG POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR SPRANG BAN SNYOM LAS PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS MTSO BDUN GYI LHA KHANG CHEN MOR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD DANG BRTZON PA MI DMAN PA'I DGE SLONG GRAGS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
